main event: A UFO was reported in Saudi Arabia on November 27, 1953, observed descending from 20 degrees elevation to 5 degrees elevation at a speed of 1.75 degrees per second before disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a round silver object, about the size of a pinhead, with one side appearing reflective.
The observation lasted only two seconds, taking place at dusk.
No preliminary analysis was offered due to the short duration of the sighting and lack of detail on physical characteristics.
The report mentions the release of one balloon from Dhahran Airfield, but it is unclear if it was related to the UFO sighting.
The report indicates an insufficient amount of data for evaluation and offers no explanation for the observed phenomenon.
